<!-- Hack: TypeScript has better syntax highlighting than MkDocs flavored Luau lol -->

```TypeScript
start(
    root: Root
): StartedRoot
```

Starts the root. This should only be called once per root.

## Parameters

<h3 class="prvdmwrong-api-param">
  <span class="prvdmwrong-api-type">
    root: Root
  </span>
</h3>

The root to start.

## Returns

<h3 class="prvdmwrong-api-return">
  <span class="prvdmwrong-api-type">
    StartedRoot
  </span>
</h3>

A root that has been started.
